data.title: Directory – Town Center Corte Madera
data.meta_description: 50+ unique shops and restaurants including REI, Sephora, Athleta, Crate & Barrel, Il Fornaio, Fieldwork Brewing, The Container Store & more.
data.text:
Anthem

Anthem is a luxurious home retailer, with four locations throughout the Bay Area. Anthem is truly a family business, run by Janelle and her husband Kirk. Anthem carries a unique collection of the finest products, designed to inspire and delight.

Hours:

Monday - Saturday 10:00a.m. - 7:00p.m.

Sunday- 11:00a.m. - 6:00p.m.

Phone: 415-440-6500

Website: http://www.antheminteriors.com

Arhaus

Known for beautiful furniture and décor handcrafted by artisans around the world, Arhaus offers heirloom-quality pieces for the entire home — indoors and out.

Since its founding in 1986, Arhaus product developers have traveled the globe, working with skilled artisans to craft pieces that can only be found at Arhaus and ensuring that every piece meets exceptional standards for quality and beauty.

In addition to a globally curated collection of furniture and décor, Arhaus’ Corte Madera location offers an expert team of designers who provide complimentary design services, both in person and virtually, as well as robust custom-design capabilities and special offerings for industry professionals.

ATHLETA

Located just off the freeway with easy parking, our store is located in Town Center Corte Madera, nestled in the heart of Marin just seven miles north of the Golden Gate Bridge. Enjoy hiking and biking trails on your way to and from the Town Center. When you need to refuel, you can always stop & shop the variety of lifestyle shops for some retail therapy (or dine at one of the excellent restaurants)! We hope to see you soon, and of course, your furry friends are always welcome in the store…dog treats included!

Athleta has been outfitting women athletes with ultimate performance apparel and gear since 1998. They take pride in testing everything themselves to be sure that each item offered features the perfect balance of performance and style.

Hours:

Mon: 10 am - 8 pm

Tue: 10 am - 8 pm

Wed: 10 am - 8 pm

Thu: 10 am - 8 pm

Fri: 10 am - 8 pm

Sat: 10 am - 7 pm

Sun: 10 am - 6 pm

215 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 945-9013

Website: http://www.athleta.com/

Eddie Bauer

Established in 1920 in Seattle, Eddie Bauer is a specialty retailer that sells sportswear, outerwear, footwear, gear and accessories for the active outdoor lifestyle. Eddie Bauer is nationally recognized brand that stands for high quality, innovation, style, and customer service. Eddie Bauer products are available at approximately 400 stores throughout the United States, Canada and Japan through catalog sales and online at www.eddiebauer.com.

Hours:

Monday & Wednesday 1:00 P.M. to 5:00 P.M.

Sunday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday & Saturday 11:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. (store closed for lunch 2p-2:30p)

214 Corte Madera Town Center

Website: http://www.eddiebauer.com/

Ethan Allen

Ethan Allen at Corte Madera is the leading destination for high-quality home furnishings. It offers everything you need—furniture, window treatments, decorative accessories, rugs, lighting, artwork, mirrors, bedding, mattresses, and more. Known for its superior craftsmanship, the company offers designer-quality styles plus complimentary interior design service at a remarkable value. With access to countless custom design options, it’s easy to create a look that’s all your own at Ethan Allen.

Visit Ethan Allen today to discover something extraordinary.

Hours:

10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. M-F

10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Sat.

11:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Sun.

Phone: (415) 383-3600

Website: http://ethanallen.com/

Five Little Monkeys

Named for her family of five siblings (she’s the oldest), Stephanie Sala’s Five Little Monkeys stores are the Bay Area’s go-to destinations for high-quality toys. There are fun discoveries on every shelf–from stomp rockets to Magna-tiles, to snakes made of magic sequins and bath bombs with surprises inside! The knowledgeable staff can help lead you to the perfect present and provide complimentary gift wrapping services–a life saver for last-minute birthday party or holiday shopping! Take a stroll down memory lane in this picturesque toy shop, and be sure to play with the toys!

Phone: (415) 886-8497

Website: https://www.5littlemonkeys.com/

Louis Thomas Men’s & Formal Wear

Louis Thomas is fine men’s clothing on a first name basis.

For almost 60 years we have specialized in bringing customers stylish and well made gentleman’s apparel. We offer select garments for work, play, and formal occasions. We also supply made-to-measure suits and custom dress shirts built just for you along with a wide variety of gentlemanly accessories.

Our knowledgeable staff is happy to help with any questions you may have. Visit our store location to view our unique stock of goods. We think you’ll be surprised.

212 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 924-1715

Website: http://www.louisthomas.com/

Paper Source

Paper Source is a premier paperie and retail store offering a unique selection of fine and artisanal papers, stationery, invitations, gift wrap, greeting cards, quirky gifts and a custom collection of envelopes and cards. Paper Source offers an original and distinctive aesthetic, with a color palette and proprietary designs that are developed and created exclusively by us.

At Paper Source, our mission is to inspire you to “do something creative every day” — to spark ideas and provide materials to celebrate life moments with beauty, humor, originality, and personal expression. A funny card, a lovely invitation, a beautifully bound album, a wrapped gift — we believe that each offers a unique opportunity for creative expression in everyday life. At Paper Source, we are committed to innovation and original design, offering an assortment that allows our customers to express themselves through inspired creativity. Our goal is to continue to bring the unique Paper Source experience closer to our customers by opening new stores around the country and expanding the product offering on our web site.

327 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 927-1528

Website: https://www.papersource.com/

Pollen + Wool

Pollen + Wool is born from the appreciation for beauty of a golden field of wheat, the pleasure of walking barefoot on dewdrop grass at dawn, and the satisfaction in drinking tea from a hand thrown mug. It is the beauty in the simple, the raw, the elemental. Looking north to her Norwegian heritage, owner Kristina De Pizzol has found her design aesthetic echoed contemporary Scandinavian design. Pollen + Wool celebrates the work of the artisan who throws clay on a wheel, supports designers working to empower women globally, and sources products which are intentional-using organic, sustainable materials whenever possible. Pollen + Wool is a lifestyle boutique which celebrates that which is good that which is made and that which is unapologetically splendid.

Hours:

Monday to Friday 10AM-8PM

Saturday 10AM-6PM

Sunday 11AM- 6PM

211 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: 415-891-8700

Website: https://pollenandwool.com/

Sephora

Sephora is a leader in global beauty retail, teaching and inspiring clients to play in a world of beauty. Sephora has earned its reputation with its expertise, innovation, and entrepreneurial spirit, and has been changing the face of prestige cosmetics since its debut in Paris in the early 1970’s. A year after its acquisition by luxury group LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton in 1997, Sephora expanded its empire to North America with a revolutionary store model that broke down the department store counter. Now with more than 360 stores in the Americas—including US, Canada, Mexico, and Brazil—plus 500 inside JCPenney, Sephora has become a leading international beauty destination with over 2,000 locations in 31 countries, plus an award-winning website and an intuitive mobile app. Clients have the opportunity to play with 14,000 products from 200 carefully curated brands, featuring indie darlings, emerging favorites, trusted classics, and Sephora’s private label, SEPHORA COLLECTION. In store, the client receives personalized recommendations from the IQ system, and at the Beauty Studio she explores her look with makeovers, complimentary classes, hands-on events, and one-on-one consultations. Online she interacts with an inclusive beauty community on the award-winning Beauty Board, interactive Beauty Talk, and The Sephora Glossy blog. And as one of Sephora’s 17 million Beauty Insiders, she feeds her beauty addiction with unique rewards and experiences. Sephora offers endless ways to explore beauty. For the latest, visit sephora.com

347 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 927-1740

Website: https://www.sephora.com/happening/stores/corte-madera-town-center

Sleep Number

The leader in sleep innovation, Sleep Number delivers proven, quality sleep through effortless, adjustable comfort and biometric sleep tracking. Sleep Number’s revolutionary 360® smart bed and SleepIQ® technology are proving the connection between sleep and well-being. With one of the most comprehensive databases of biometric sleep data and ranked #1 in J.D. Power’s 2018 Mattress Satisfaction Report, Sleep Number is improving lives by individualizing sleep experiences. And with a commitment to improving the lives of youth by 2025, Sleep Number is redefining the future of health and wellness—for everyone. Visit sleepnumber.com or one of over 580 Sleep Number® stores located in all 50 states.

419 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (628) 252-2727

Website: https://www.sleepnumber.com/

The Container Store

In 1978, The Container Store opened the first store devoted entirely to storage and organization products. Today, we remain the leader of the industry we created by providing unparalleled customer service and a collection of multifunctional products that help our customers save space, and ultimately, save valuable time. And who couldn’t use a little more of that?

Our store offers more than 10,000 products to help your organize just about any area of your home or office. If your closet is a catastrophe or your garage is out of gear, our organization experts can create a free, customized space plan for you with elfa®, our best-selling product and the backbone of every well-organized space.

So get in to The Container Store, and let us help you get organized!

219 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 945-9755

Website: http://www.containerstore.com/

Viva Diva

Open since 1997, originally in Downtown San Rafael, Viva Diva is a contemporary women’s clothing boutique which offers a fashion-friendly environment reminiscent of visits with a close friend. Viva Diva is fun, encouraging, honest and with a true “girlfriendy” vibe. The Viva Gals are constantly sourcing new looks and new lines that offer the best-quality contemporary styles with the biggest bang for their buck. We are all about easy, cool Marin County fashion. At Viva Diva, we believe in real-girl, wearable looks that are flattering and versatile, as well as comfortable and totally classic. A perfect combination of new well-chosen essentials and fabulous statement pieces arrive daily, making it easy to build upon and expand your Viva Diva wardrobe from season to season.

111 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: 415.256.8380

Website: https://www.vivadivaboutique.com

Blue Barn

Welcome to the Blue Barn, a new style of neighborhood deli dedicated to quality food in both flavor and harvest. Chef driven and product oriented, our menu offers thoughtful salads, toasted sandwiches, grilled cheese and soups for a customer that values quality, ingredients and convenience from a local artisan. Committed to improving the way people eat, we pursue the sustainable and organic ideals that support the greater slow food movement and hope you will join us in these efforts. We are proud to be partnered with many local producers and are inspired most dearly by the seasonal produce harvests of Oak Hill Farm, a small, sustainable, and family-run farm located in Sonoma.

335 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: 415-927-1104

Website: http://www.bluebarngourmet.com/corte-madera-1

Il Fornaio

Step inside Il Fornaio and take a culinary journey through Italy. Early mornings bring rustic, crisp crusted bread hot from the oven accompanied by the scent of fresh brewed espresso. During lunch and dinner hours, pastas and flavorful sauces simmer while meats and vegetables roast over hot coals. Bottles of wine from small, regional wineries are uncorked to complement the dishes, which have been crafted in the custom of Italy’s chefs, bakers and homemakers. Voted best Italian Restaurant in Marin. Indulge your Italian spirit experience Il Fornaio.

In the tradition of Italy’s trattorias, the sights, sounds and aromas of authentic Italian cuisine are recreated fresh every day at Il Fornaio Cucina Italiana.

223 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 927-4400

Website: http://www.ilfornaio.com/

Juice Shop

Juice Shop, owned by three Marin County brothers – Charlie, Ben and Jacob Gulick, plus Charlie’s wife Lina have opened a location at the Town Center. Juice Shop, which has become a popular and definitive source for fresh, 100 % organic, healthy juices and cleanses, with their first location in San Francisco, have opened a location at the Town Center in the space between the Eddie Bauer and The Container Store.

In addition to the “green” juices they started with, the Juice Shop now offers a variety of juices, which are delivered fresh daily to each outpost. Products include a variety of cleanses, fruit and vegetable juices such as Pineapple-Pear Chia, Beta Beet, Coco-Chlorophyll, fresh Almond Milk, and Liver-Aid, as well as elixir shot concoctions like Aloe, Immunity, and Blue-Green Algae.

The juice is pressed daily in a production facility in San Francisco and delivered fresh each and every day. Juice Shop juices are bottled in glass and made using the cold press method of extraction (hydraulically-pressed), which retains the highest density of flavor and nutrients of all the ingredients used.

Hours:

Monday through Friday: 10:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

Saturday: 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

Sunday: 11:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.

221 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 927-1959

Website: https://juiceshop.com/

Pacific Catch

Lunch | Dinner | Happy Hour | Catering Platters | Group Dining | Take Out

Pacific Catch is a reasonably-priced fresh fish grill, showcasing the flavors of the Pacific, which will be opening its second location in the Corte Madera Town Center. The first Pacific Catch restaurant was opened to critical acclaim for its food quality in the Marina district in San Francisco in April 2003.

Pacific Catch is focused on serving chef-quality fish items cooked-to-order, utilizing fresh and wholesome ingredients & house-made sauces inspired by the flavors of the Pacific.

Pacific Catch features a coastal-inspired seafood menu featuring local ingredients, sushi grade fish from the Pacific, Hawaiian style fish sandwiches, island fish tacos with our famous sweet potato fries, Japanese-style rice bowls, salads with fresh grilled fish and wild baby greens, along with Pacific Rim desserts like our Mochi ice cream fondue.

“Pacific Catch is deliciously worth a visit…offering a sophisticated balance of textures, colors, flavors and temperatures” — Bill Daley, Food Critic, San Francisco Chronicle

133 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 927-3474

Website: http://www.pacificcatch.com/

Pig in a Pickle

Pig in a Pickle, the newest addition to the great variety of culinary choices available at Town Center Corte Madera, will offer a mouthwatering assortment of barbeque dishes delivered straight from the restaurant’s custom smokers. Pig in a Pickle is the brainchild of professional chef and Corte Madera native, Damon Stainbrook, who after years of cooking at high end restaurants and a stint as a private chef, will now become proprietor of his own restaurant specializing in barbeque sandwiches, delicious side dishes, and special items smoked on the premises. Pig in a Pickle is located next to Blue Barn Gourmet, across from The Counter.

Phone: Restaurant: (415) 891-3265

Catering: (415) 891-8124

Website: https://www.piginapickle.com/

See’s Candies

See’s Famous Old Time Candies are well known and loved throughout the West where the company was founded in 1921. If you were to visit a See’s store, you would find a sparkling clean black and white shop where your candies would be packed to order as you made your candy selection. See’s reputation for friendly old-fashioned service remains unrivaled.

To produce the best possible boxed chocolates, we at See’s acquire the choicest and finest grade raw ingredients from all over the world. No additives or preservatives are ever used in See’s Candies, only fresh wholesome ingredients. Making over 100 varieties of candies, we have maintained our reputation for excellence by strict adherence to See’s “Quality Without Compromise” motto.

348 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 927-4430

Website: http://www.sees.com/

Starbird

Starbird is the nation’s first Super-Premium Fast Food restaurant. Known for its hand-crafted, feel good crispy chicken, bold flavors and chef-driven innovation, Starbird offers an unrivaled customer experience coupled with a broad chicken based menu and tech-enabled solutions, enabling guests to order online via their mobile app or website. The brand’s chicken is always raised with no antibiotics, individually hand breaded in a secret blend of gluten free flours and spices and served with any one of Starbird’s nine tasty, homemade sauces. Starbird’s new Corte Madera restaurant will serve fan favorites including crispy tenders, hand-chopped salads, wings, sandwiches served on house baked rolls, and more.

Hours:

Monday though Friday: 11:00am to 9:00pm

Saturday: 11:00am to 7:00pm

Sunday: 11:00am to 6:00pm

205 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415)-758-4118

Website: https://www.starbirdchicken.com/locations#loc-cortemadera

World Wrapps

The original founders and Marin residents, Keith Cox and Matt Blair, recently bought back World Wrapps, which they started 21 years ago in San Francisco. Inspired by their world travels, they’ve created an ALL NEW MENU of WRAPPS, ROLLS and BOWLS, including wrapp-size sushi rolls and oversize summer rolls in rice paper. Signature items like the Thai Chicken, Tikka Masala and Korean BBQ, utilize wrapp dough made in-house from scratch and fresh pressed to order. All items are crafted to be served in a bowl. The branding and dining space have also been updated with indoor booths, outdoor communal tables and a design reminiscent of global food shacks.

Join us on Facebook: at facebook.com/worldwrapps

Follow us on Twitter: @worldwrapps

208 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (425) 927-3663 or email us at chamin@worldwrapps.com

Website: http://www.worldwrapps.com/

AT&T

Now open, the new retail store intends to simplify the customer experience and will showcase AT&T’s complete portfolio of wireless, broadband, high definition TV/video and wireline voice products and services- offering a fully integrated media, entertainment and communication retail experience to customers- all under one roof.

For more than a century, AT&T has consistently provided innovative, reliable, high-quality products and services and excellent customer care. Their mission is to connect people with their world, and AT&T is fulfilling this vision by creating new solutions for consumers and businesses and by driving innovation in the communications and entertainment industry.

305 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 924-9803

Website: http://www.att.com/

Chase

Chase is the U.S. consumer and commercial banking business of JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE: JPM), a leading global financial services firm with assets of $2.3 trillion and operations in more than 60 countries. We are the neighborhood bank for thousands of communities across the country. We serve approximately one of out of every six Americans through more than 5,600 bank branches; 19,000 ATMs; mortgage offices; online and mobile banking; as well as relationships with auto dealerships, schools and universities.

LensCrafters

We make finding the perfect glasses so much easier.

We’re masters at helping you navigate through the maze of styles, trends and materials to find that elusive prize — glasses you can’t wait to wear. All you have to do is tell us a little about what you’re after and we’ll take care of the rest. Don’t worry, that’s our specialty.

329 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 945-9917

Website: http://www.lenscrafters.com/

Poppy Bank

Since opening our first branch in January 2005, Poppy Bank has grown to over $2 Billion in assets with branches across the San Francisco Bay Area, Roseville and Southern California. We also have loan production offices in Northern and Southern California, as well as in Washington, Utah, Arizona, North Carolina, and New Jersey. Our commitment to providing the best products and services has propelled our success and garnered national recognition of our performance. Poppy Bank is 5-star rated by BauerFinancial, the nation’s leading independent bank and credit union rating firm, and is recognized as one of the strongest financial institutions in the country. The Bank is governed by our strong team of Executive Officers and a dedicated Board of Directors formed entirely by accomplished business leaders. We exist to meet the banking needs of our clients and to make a positive difference in the communities we serve.

Hours:

Located inside Safeway

137 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: 415-927-9080

Website: https://www.poppy.bank/

T-Mobile

T-Mobile is America’s supercharged Un-carrier, delivering an advanced 4G LTE and transformative nationwide 5G network that will offer reliable connectivity for all. T-Mobile’s customers benefit from its unmatched combination of value and quality, unwavering obsession with offering them the best possible service experience and indisputable drive for disruption that creates competition and innovation in wireless and beyond.

Hours:

Monday: 10AM–8PM

Tuesday: 10AM–8PM

Wednesday: 10AM–8PM

Thursday: 10AM–8PM

Friday: 10AM–8PM

Saturday: 10AM–6PM

Sunday: 11AM–6PM

436 Corte Madera Town Center

Phone: (415) 548-2432

Website: http://www.t-mobile.com

Wells Fargo

Wells Fargo is proud to serve the residents and community of Marin County. Our team of more than 300 team members is ready to serve you at 14 store locations and for fast and easy access to your everyday banking, we have over 40 ATMs spread throughout the county. Wells Fargo’s talented team of financial professionals is dedicated to helping this community succeed financially.

Speak with a Wells Fargo banker at our store located within the Corte Madera Town Center to receive a free financial review. We’re here to listen and provide personalized recommendations from our diverse suite of solutions spanning consumer, small business, and commercial products. Whether you need to get started with your first bank account, get help as you buy your first home, secure small business lending or are looking for guidance with retirement planning, we can help.

We invite you to visit our store which is open Monday through Saturday from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm. You can also reach a banker by phone by calling (415) 924-1733 during business hours.

For 24 hour access to making deposits and withdrawals, we have three Envelope-FreeSM ATMs within the center. Envelope-Free ATMs allow you to make deposits without envelopes or deposit slips. Our ATMs are available at our banking store or at the Safeway inside this shopping center.

770 Tamalpais Dr. in Corte Madera
